slides.title: A Mid-Century Modern Home
slides.description: A complete renovation was required to bring this home up to current lifestyle & code standards. From inception through completion, this project required hands on project management, including selection of all interior & exterior finishes, selection & oversight of all contractors & artisans

slides.title: Handsome Transitional Home
slides.description: Adorned to be adored, this home was customized to reflect the lifestyle and taste of its new owner. Designed with new detailing, custom metal railings along the steps and second floor overlook, lead you the guest rooms & living space
